titles.title: Help Kids Save for College Act of 2013
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow nontaxable employer matching contributions to section 529 college savings plans.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 8/1/2013--Introduced. Help Kids Save for College Act of 2013 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to exclude from the gross income of an employee amounts, up to $1,000, paid by an employer to a qualified college savings assistance plan for a designated beneficiary.
